BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: TEXAS ASSOCFOR HEALTHPHYSICAL EDUCATION RECREATION & DANCE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENHANCE AND CONTINUALLY IMPROVE PROGRAMS PROVIDED TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC BY PROFESSIONALS IN THE DISCIPLINES OF HEALTH, PHYSICAL EDUCATION, RECREATION AND DANCE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENHANCE AND CONTINUALLY IMPROVE PROGRAMS PROVIDED TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC BY PROFESSIONALS IN THE DISCIPLINES OF HEALTH, PHYSICAL EDUCATION, RECREATION AND DANCE.
IRS990.Desc: MULTIPLE EDUCATIONAL MEETINGS INCLUDING THE ANNUAL CONVENTION, ADMINISTRATORS CONFERENCE, LEADERSHIP CONFERENCE, STUDENT CONFERENCE AND SUMMER CONFERENCE HELD DURING THE YEAR TO PROVIDE EDUCATION AND INFORMATION TO MEMBERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PUBLICATIONS TO EDUCATE AND INFORM MEMBERS INCLUDE THE FALL, SPRING AND SUMMER JOURNAL ISSUES, AND ELECTRONIC NEWSLETTERS TO MEMBERS WITH THE MOST RECENT HEALTH, PHYSICAL EDUCATION, RECREATION AND DANCE NEWS AND ANNOUNCEMENTS OF EVENTS AND OTHER ITEMS OF INTEREST.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: TAHPERD HAS PARTNERED WITH THE AMERICAN HEART ASSOCIATION FOR MORE THAN 25 YEARS TO PROVIDE PROGRAMS INCLUDING JUMP ROPE FOR HEART AND HOOPS FOR HEART, NATIONAL EDUCATION PROGRAMS FOR ELEMENTARY STUDENTS THAT TEACH PHYSICAL FITNESS AND PROMOTE COMMUNITY SERVICE.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: MEMBERSHIP SERVICES PROVIDED TO OVER 4,000 MEMBERS INCLUDING VOLUNTEER AND LEADERSHIP OPPORTUNITIES, NETWORKING, CAREER AND RESOURCE SERVICES, E-DIRECTORY, AND MANY OTHER SERVICES. ALSO SUPPORT OF TAHPERD FOUNDATION AND TRUST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MEMBERSHIP OF TAHPERD CONSISTS OF PROFESSIONAL MEMBERS, STUDENT MEMBERS, RETIRED MEMBERS, EMERITUS MEMBERS, ASSOCIATE MEMBERS AND CORPORATE MEMBERS.
PROFESSIONAL AND RETIRED MEMBERS ELECT THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

AMENDMENTS OR CHANGES TO THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION OR BYLAWS MUST FIRST BE APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. A VOTE OF TWO-THIRDS OF THE MEMBERS OF THE REPRESENTATIVE ASSEMBLY SHALL BE REQUIRED FOR SUCH AMENDMENT TO BECOME EFFECTIVE.
THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS PROVIDED A COPY OF THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO ITS FILING.

THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS PROVIDED ANNUAL TRAINING ON THE ASSOCIATION POLICIES INCLUDING THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO BRING TO THE PRESIDENT'S ATTENTION ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST PRIOR TO A VOTE ON ANY SUCH MATTERS.

THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE IS MADE UP OF INDEPENDENT PERSONS THAT PERFORM THE ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND RECOMMEND TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS A COURSE OF ACTION REGARDING RENEWAL OF EMPLOYMENT. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES THE EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT AND COMPENSATION.
THE ASSOCIATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO MEMBERS UPON REQUEST.
MEMBERSHIP SERVICES PROVIDED TO OVER 4,000 MEMBERS 92412. 0. 134755.
